transcripts.transcript_text:
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hello.
Speaker B: Hello.
Speaker A: Hello. Hi Aman, this is Arushi from Amber Student, the official accommodation partner for University College Bandon. How are you?
Speaker B: I'm okay, how are you?
Speaker A: I'm good as well. So I'll be helping you book your student accommodation near your university. I just wanted to know. This is September intake, right?
Speaker B: This is September intake.
Speaker A: Okay. And do you want the accommodation for 51 weeks which is almost a year?
Speaker B: No.
Speaker A: Then may I know the duration that you want it for?
Speaker B: I was looking for like 39. 40. 41.
Speaker A: Okay. So I think very few would be available for 39 weeks. Most of them would be available for 44 weeks, but still we'll have a look at the ones that are available for 39 as well. And do you have any room type preference? Like would you need a private room with the private washroom and shared kitchen which is the ensuite? Or you want all things private or are you comfortable in sharing the room or the washroom?
Speaker B: I'm sorry, just to. Just to cut you off. I've already found some accommodation so yeah, I won't be needing it anymore.
Speaker A: Okay, you've already found it. May I know how? Like did you book it on campus or have you booked a private accommodation?
Speaker B: It's on campus.
Speaker A: Okay, got it. Thank you so much. Thank you. Bye Bye.
